ul.li: check if database file access is blocked by any third party software, e.g. an antivirus;
check the memory for any spurious StudDB.exe processes and terminate them if necessary;
check that System.Data.SQLite.dll file is present in the Dialog Nibelung StudDB installation directory. reinstall the software if it is, in fact, missing.
make sure that user directories are accessible for reading and writing to the users;
